case.title: 420 friends this afternoon? - 40 (Brooklyn)
case.text: Hello, seeking a non perv 420 hangout for this afternoon, a meeting of the minds... I am single and I am looking for a relationship, but not a hook up. About me: I am a creative hipsterish very tall and thick, between plus size and bbw, brunette, sweet and funny and very laid back. Would love to meet a cool guy, listen to some music, talk and see what's going on...
